arts.ttl: Alexander-Arnold or Carvajal? How Real Madrid could line up against Marseille
arts.sum: Sports Mole takes an in-depth look at how Real Madrid could line up in Tuesday's Champions League clash with Marseille.

arts.ttl: Kylian Mbappe fires cheeky Marseille warning ahead of Champions League kick off
arts.sum: Real Madrid have enjoyed a perfect start to the 2025/26 La Liga season under Xabi Alonso’s leadership. Los Blancos have won all four of their opening games of the new league campaign with a two point lead over arch foes Barcelona in the rankings. arts.ttl: Amine Gouiri to travel with Marseille squad to face Real Madrid
